cute4gerbil Fri, 28 May 2004 01:27:16 -0000
>> how to [simulate] right and left click?

J. B. Rainsberger Thu, 27 May 2004 23:40:14 -0400
> Are you working with a Swing application or a web application?

The better question would be, are you testing a web GUI or a Java GUI?
(Swing is not the only way to implement a Java GUI :-) Note that a GUI
running in a browser is almost certainly a web GUI, even if it happens
to be a JSP--a GUI *generated by* Java is not necessarily the same as
a GUI *implemented in* Java.

For questions about testing Java GUIs, try

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/java-gui-testing/

For questions about testing web GUIs: is there a specialized
group/list?
